Package net.intelie.challenges

Interface EventStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventStoreImpl
    public interface EventStore
    An abstraction of an event store.

    Events may be stored in memory, data files, a database, on a remote server, etc. For this challenge, you should implement an in-memory event event store.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void insert​(Event event)
      Stores an event
      EventIterator query​(java.lang.String type, long startTime, long endTime)
      Retrieves an iterator for events based on their type and timestamp.
      void removeAll​(java.lang.String type)
      Removes all events of specific type.

      • query

        EventIterator query​(java.lang.String type,
                    long startTime,
                    long endTime)
        Retrieves an iterator for events based on their type and timestamp.
        Parameters:
        type - The type we are querying for.
        startTime - Start timestamp (inclusive).
        endTime - End timestamp (exclusive).
        Returns:
        An iterator where all its events have same type as {@param type} and timestamp between {@param startTime} (inclusive) and {@param endTime} (exclusive).
